org.framed.orm.ui.editPolicy

Class ORMShapeGraphicalNodeEditPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies.AbstractEditPolicy
      • org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies.GraphicalEditPolicy
        • org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies.GraphicalNodeEditPolicy
          • org.framed.orm.ui.editPolicy.ORMShapeGraphicalNodeEditPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.gef.EditPolicy, org.eclipse.gef.RequestConstants

    public class ORMShapeGraphicalNodeEditPolicy
extends org.eclipse.gef.editpolicies.GraphicalNodeEditPolicy
    This GraphicalNodeEditPolicy handles request for the creations of all kinds of Relations between Shapes and creates and returns the necessary commands for that purpose. NewObject = O/o SourceEditPart = S/s TargetEditPart = T/t
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski
